SLG_partnertalk.value: I’ve got to focus on the battle...
We can win at this rate!
Just keep it up a bit longer!
Keep your cool, Aoi. That’s how we win.

You, you’re right...
Thank you, I’ve recovered now.

Hang in there, Aoi. We’re all gonna make it
out of this together!

Yes, you’re right. We can make it through
with everyone!

Come on, Aoi! We’ll pull through this
together!

Yes, Takuma...
We can do it!
It’s okay, Minoru, we can do this!
Yeah, yeah you’re right!

...Let’s go, Minoru.
The two of us can do anything.

Yeah, you said it...
That’s my buddy for you!
I’m counting on you, Minoru!

Don’t worry, Takuma! When I’ve got Falcomon’s
help, you can count on me for anything!

I’m actually pretty scared.
But we can win together, I know it!

I-I ain’t scared!
Hmph, of course we’re gonna win!

These enemies are tough...
Don’t let your guard down, Ryo.

That’s my line!
Don’t mess up and get killed, now!
You’d better keep up, Ryo!
And you’d better not lag behind!

If we fight with a cool head, we can’t lose.
...Right, Shuuji?

Uh, yeah...
Keep it together, everyone!
You’re not alone, Shuuji. We’re with you!

I’m happy to hear you say that.
Thank you so much.
Shuuji! Let’s go at it with all we’ve got!

You’re right, Takuma...
The fight’s decided here!

Eyes ahead, Saki.
We haven’t lost yet!
Yeah, we’re just getting started!

Hold on a little longer, Saki!
We’ll force our way through!
Okay! Let’s finish this now!
Saki... We’ll win this fight together, right?

Yes, Takuma...
The two of us will win for sure!

If you act on your own, don’t get mad
if I butt in!
Man, what a pain you are...

We won’t let it end like this!
Right, Kaito?!
Of course, I ain’t gonna screw up here!
Watch my back, Kaito!

You got it, Takuma!
Leave it to me!

Miu...you all right?
You’re not scared, are you?
Uh, yeah... I, I’ll do my best!
Can I leave this area to you, Miu?
Yeah! I’ll show you what we’re made of!
Having you here’s a big help, Miu!

I feel the same... Because of you,
I can stand here and fight!
Pull yourself together, Professor!

My apologies, Takuma...
I’m afraid I became a bit daunted there.
Let’s do this, Professor!

But of course, Takuma!
With our powers combined, we can’t lose!

...You okay, Miyuki? Are you scared?
You can trust me... I’m here for you.

Thanks, Takuma...
I feel braver hearing you say that!
We’ll make it through somehow, Miyuki!
Yes, Takuma! We’ll endure this together!

Tell me if it it gets tough out there,
Agumon.
You’re worried about me? Thanks, Takuma!
Here it comes... Get ready to throw down!
Of course! Leave it to me!
Let’s go, Agumon!
Yeah!
You can do it, Takuma!
Yeah... Thanks, Agumon!
How about my claws?!
Okay, give it a shot!
Here I go, Takuma!
Yeah! Go for it!
Be careful and we’ll win this!
Yeah, leave it to me, Takuma!
Give it everything you’ve got, Greymon!
You got it, Takuma!
Let’s break through this, Greymon!
I’ve been waiting to hear you say that!
Right, now let’s push on through!
Yeah! Let me handle this!
We’ll finish things here, Tyranomon!
All right! Let’s tear it up!

You all right, Tyranomon?
Still up for this?

Of course, Takuma!
I haven’t even broken a sweat!
We’ll scrape through this!
Yeah, lemme show you what I can do!
Break on through, Tuskmon!
Yeah! Get a load of this!
We’ve almost won this, Tuskmon!

I got it, Takuma!
Time to take out the trash!
Let’s do this, MetalGreymon!
Okay, I’ll give it all I got!
I see the light at the end of the tunnel!
Yeah, I see it, too!
Give it all you got, MetalGreymon!
I’m feeling you, Takuma!
We can win this, Triceramon!
Yeah! Victory’s all I can see!

Okay, Triceramon, let’s take some time to
compose ourselves here!

Of course, Takuma! We won’t win the fight
with guts alone!
With our bond... We won’t lose to any foe!

Our bond...
Yeah, you’re right, Takuma!
Smash it all to bits, Megadramon!
Smash! My favorite word!
Beat ’em to a pulp... Got it, Megadramon?

That’s the best order for me...
Consider it done!

As long as we’ve got your power, we can’t
lose... Right, Megadramon?
Yeah, you can count on me, Takuma!
SkullGreymon... Can I leave it to you?
Yeah...

SkullGreymon... I’m expecting great things
from that killer instinct of yours!
Sure...

We’ll make it through together...
Right, SkullGreymon?
Uh huh...

So this is the ultimate power of valor...
Let’s do this, WarGreymon!
Yes, Takuma. Leave this fight to me!
Protect everyone, WarGreymon!

Okay, Takuma. I’ll defeat our foes, and guard
our friends!
Let me show you what I can do, Takuma!
Looking forward to it, WarGreymon!

I can feel it, Takuma...
Those burning feelings of yours...
I can sense your courage, too, WarGreymon!
Do your best, Dinorexmon!

Of course, Takuma!
I’ll deal with this somehow!

Tear the enemy to bits, Dinorexmon!
Show no mercy!
Just watch, Takuma! I’ll do it in one go!
I don’t gotta hold back, right, Takuma?
Nope, go nuts out there!
I’ll strike at the enemy core, Takuma!
Go for it, Dinorexmon!
Crush the enemy, Mugendramon!
Yeah, I’ll flatten them like a pancake!

Mugendramon... There’s no way you can lose.
I believe in you!

Guess I gotta live up to those expectations!
No holding back, then!

I’ll murderalize every last one of them,
Takuma!
Got it, Mugendramon. Do your thing!
Hey! Get fired up, Takuma!

You got it, Mugendramon!
Beat them back with all you’ve got!
Let’s do our best out there, Omegamon!

Yes, a great deal of souls have bestowed
their power unto me. Here I go, Takuma!
Omegamon... Let’s go!
Yes... Let’s finish the fight, Takuma!

Takuma! Let’s weather this storm together!
Then we’ll grasp our victory!

What amazing spirit, Omegamon...
Okay, let’s do this!

For you, Takuma, I’ll fight with all my
strength!

Omegamon... Let’s make our hopes come true,
together!
No time for discussion...
Careful not to get hurt!
Just a little more, hang in there!
Don’t fall here! I know you can win!

Remember that you have us too, Takuma. Don’t
push yourself too much.
Thanks, let’s get through this together!

We can’t let it end here. Let’s combine
forces and move forward!
Yeah, you’re right. We’ll win for sure!
Let’s do our best, Takuma!
Yeah, you got it!

We have to cut off the source of disorder...
No mercy for the self-obsessed!
Uh... Yeah, sure, Aoi...
Cheer up, Minoru. A sad face isn’t like you.
Yeah... Yeah, you’re right, Aoi!
Careful, Minoru. Proceed with caution!
I got it, already!
Are you okay, Minoru? You seem tired.

Thanks for thinking of me, but I’m good!
No worries!

Minoru... I’m going to exterminate the enemy.
Please help me...
Yeah... Whatever you say.

Are you shaking, Ryo?
Take a deep breath and calm down.

Shut up! Leave me alone!
*huff*... *huff*...

There’s just a bit more to endure, so hang in
there!
Yeah, we’re almost there, ain’t we?
Do your best, Shuuji!

Thanks for the reassurance.
I can feel the power welling up inside of me.
We still have hope, Shuuji... Don’t give up!
Yes, this is no place to lose heart!
Stand back, Saki. I’ll handle things next.
Appreciate the thought, but I’m not done yet!
We’ll pull through this together, Saki!

You know it!
We can do it, Aoi, you and me!

Don’t push yourself so hard.
You can rely on us, you know.
Hmph... Nobody asked your opinion.
Be careful, Kaito... The enemy is strong.

I got it, already...
I’ll make sure not to mess up here!

Are you all right, Miu?
Are you scared?

I mean, I am, but...
I’ll deal with it somehow!
Let’s do our best out there, Miu!
You bet, Aoi!
Let’s stay focused, Professor!
Indeed, Aoi. Be on your guard!
Professor! Are you okay?

Ah, yes...
Sorry for worrying you.
You okay, Miyuki? Can you still fight?!
Don’t worry, I’m fine.

Hold it together, Miyuki!
The fight isn’t over yet!

Thank you, Aoi.
You’re right, this battle’s just begun.
Don’t push yourself too hard, Labramon!
No worries! Just watch from there, Aoi!
Are you okay, Labramon? Can you still fight?
Of course, Aoi! No problem!
Let’s fight with everyone, Labramon!
Yeah, I’ll give it a shot, Aoi!

Keep your eye on the enemy!
It’s time to take them down!
Yes, understood!
Let’s protect everyone, Aoi!
Yes, Labramon!
I can get through anything with you, Aoi!
I feel the same, Labramon!
You okay, Aoi? You seem to be flustered...

No, that’s not it...
Don’t worry, Labramon.
I believe in you, so please win!
Don’t worry. See my strength for yourself.
Use your power to save everyone, Dobermon!
Understood, Aoi. I heard you loud and clear!
Don’t overdo it, okay, Dobermon?

Thank you, Aoi.
I’ll be sure to fight with caution!
Fight with care, Cerberumon!

Yes, I’m always careful...
Don’t worry, Aoi.

Cerberumon, work together with everyone to
get through this!

You’re right, Aoi.
Teamwork is indispensable here!

Let’s bring peace back to this world,
Cerberumon!
Understood, Aoi. I’ll muster all my strength!

Anubimon... Use your ultimate strength to
restore the peace!
Acknowledged...
Let’s do it together, Anubimon!

Yes, Aoi...
Having you here gives me strength!

Keep your eye on the enemy, Aoi!
Don’t allow yourself to get restless!

Yes, impatience is the ultimate enemy...
Understood, Anubimon!

Aoi... Your wholehearted feelings are
flooding into me...
Please, Anubimon...protect everyone!
Plutomon... I can...trust you, can’t I?

Of course, Aoi...
I am your ally.

Be careful, Plutomon!
Don’t look down on the enemy!

Yes, I know, Aoi...
This enemy is strong!
Believe in me, Aoi!

Yes, Plutomon!
I’m counting on you!

Aoi, your desire is needed to guide this
world back to peace...

Understood, Plutomon...
I need a strong desire!
This is no time to talk...
Thanks, I’ll keep it up a bit longer!
You can do it! Goooooo!
It’s tough, but let’s do our best!
Yeah, let’s break on through!
Don’t forget about me, man!
I’m counting on you, Minoru!
Yeah, c’mon, Takuma! Let’s hit it!
Yeah!

If we make it through here, there’s some
tasty chow waiting for us! Let’s go!

Okay, I’ll do my be— Wait, I’m the one who’ll
have to cook that!
Time for us to work it! Brace yourself!
Yes, you’re right!
Let’s find the silver lining here!
Good stuff, Minoru!

This is real bad! Guess we’d better use that
super combo move we created...

Like hell we got one-a those!
Shoot, I’ll handle this somehow!

Let’s settle things like a couple of heroes
should!

Now you’re talking, Minoru!
We’ll tear a path through them!

Heh heh, check this, Shuuji! Time for this
secret weapon to make an appearance!

It’s not like this is the first time I’ve relied
on you... Still, thank you. Here we go.
Take ’em down quick, like a leader should!

I’m...not exactly sure what you mean, but
I’ll give it a shot!
Time for my gallant entrance!
Uh, thanks! (Why’s that annoy me somehow?)

Ready to rely on me as hard as you can out
there, Saki?

Yeah, yeah, sure, sure.
I’m counting on you, Minoru.
Longing for my helping hand, are you?
Keep yer hands to yourself! Watch this!

You can leave things to this hero of justice
sometimes, y’know, Kaito?
Justice, shmustice! I’ll handle things my way!

You okay, Miu?
I’m a bit worried about you...

Aw, jeez... You of all people worrying about
me. Still, thanks, I guess!

Say, Miu, wanna be my sidekick?
You’d be the heroine of justice.

Hmm, I don’t think I’m cut out for all
that... Aw, what the heck! I’m in, Minoru!
Hey, Prof? You scared or something?

Indeed, I do feel some fear...
But rest assured, I shall conquer it!
I’m counting on you, Professor!

Yes, watch closely, Minoru... This is how an
adult takes responsibility!
You can count on me, Miyuki!
Got it, Minoru!
Leave it to us heroes, won’t ya, Miyuki?

Minoru? A hero? Hee hee...
Sure, I understand!
Do your best, Falcomon!
I shan’t let them lay a finger on you, Minoru!
I leave it to you, Falcomon!

Understood! I’ll give it everything I’ve got,
Minoru!
You’re up, Falcomon.

Your power becomes my own, Minoru.
...So behold, this your own power!
I’m with you, Minoru!

Thanks a bunch, buddy.
Don’t worry, I can keep going!

Do not debase yourself, Minoru. You are not
usually so craven.
Well, then...here I gooo!
Now then, here I go!
You and I can do it together, Falcomon!
I know you can break on through!
Indeed, leave it to me!
Show them what you’re made of, Diatrymon!
You said it, Minoru!
Diatrymon! Here, take my hero power!
Yes, I definitely feel it!

Yatagaramon!
Show them the power of justice!
Okay, Minoru!
We’ll handle this together, Yatagaramon!
Indeed. I have need of your power, Minoru!
About time to finish this, Yatagaramon!
Yes, I second that notion, Minoru!
We’re the ultimate heroes, Valdurmon!

Heh heh...
That’s certainly your style, Minoru!

Valdurmon! We’ve come this far, so let’s
take it all the way!
Yes, Minoru! I’ll go anywhere with you!
Give me some of your courage, Minoru!

You got it, Valdurmon!
Take as much as you need!
You’re a true hero, Minoru!

Valdurmon...
You’re the real MVP!
I gotta do it, or we’re done for...

You don’t care what happens to me.
Everyone hates me, anyway...
I’m with you, so don’t worry!
I’ll leave it to you... Keep it up!

How long do you plan on fighting?
Let’s finish this already!
Yeah, I’ll give it a shot.

Jeez, guess I’ve gotta cheer you on, so you’d
better bring it, y’hear me?!
Thanks, Ryo. Happy for the support!

I’ve got your back, Takuma.
Don’t worry, just fight!
Thanks, Ryo! I’m counting on you!

Hey, don’t act so crazy out there.
Stand back for a sec, will ya?

Are you worried about me?
Thank you, I’ll do my best.
Stay alert out here, got it, Aoi?
Right. Gotcha, Ryo.

Dammit, stop dragging yer feet already!
Jeez, fine I’ll help!
Sorry man... Appreciate the assist.

Minoru! Ain’t you gonna become a hero or
something?!
That’s right! Just watch, here I go!

If you get weak-kneed I’m gonna start
freakin’ out, too. Come on, man!

Thanks, you snapped me out of it.
Sorry for making you worry.

Pull yourself together, Shuuji! You’re the
leader, ain’t ya?!

You’re right, Ryo. I’ve got to keep it
together!

Hey, step back already!
Defense makes the best offense, y’know?

You’ve got it backwards! Still, I appreciate
you breaking the tension.
We’ll pull through this together, Saki!
Was there any doubt, Ryo?!

Careful now, Saki!
Stay cautious to the very end!

Eesh... Can’t believe you of all people are
telling me that... Still, you’re not wrong!

You pack the biggest punch of all of us,
so give ’em hell out there!

I’ll finish this up in a second!
But you’d better bring it, too!

Kaito! You may be tough, but don’t let down
your guard!
Yeah, I ain’t gonna screw up here!

Don’t look so worried, Miu!
The enemy can smell it on you!

I got it, already!
I won’t lose, you hear me?!

This is the turning point, Miu!
Keep your eye on the prize!

Yes, you’re right!
I’ll do my best!

If an adult like you is scared, what the
heck’re we supposed to do, Professor?!
Ah, my apologies, Ryo...!
Let’s fight and win out there, Professor!

Certainly, Ryo!
We cannot afford to lose this fight!
I believe in you, Miyuki!
Yes... Thank you, Ryo!

You all right, Miyuki?
You ain’t nervous, are you?

Yes, I’m fine...
I can fight, you’ll see!
Hmph... Disgusting...
What, leave me alone, already!
Kew!

...I told ya already, didn’t I?
I can tell you’re just as determined as me.

Let’s go, partner!
We’ll show them we we’re made of!
Kew! Kew!

Are you...encouraging me?
Don’t worry, I can do it.
Kewkewkew!

“Do my best,” ya say?
I was gonna do that anyway!
Kew! Kew!

You’re right, Kunemon!
Even I can tell it’s do-or-die now!

Don’t give up! I mean, I got no proof you can
actually do it, but still...!
Keekee!

Hang in there, Flymon!
Pull yourself together!
Kee! Keekee!

What’s wrong, Flymon?!
Is that really all you got?!
Keekee! Keekee!
I’m counting on ya, Jewelbeemon!

Understood, Ryo!
I’ll fight with all my might!

We’ll get through this tight spot together,
Jewelbeemon!
Yeah, our combo will turn it around!
Time to show your stuff, Jewelbeemon!
Yes, Ryo! I’ll show you what I can do!

BanchoStingmon!
Crush them with your ultimate power!

You bet, Ryo! I’ll defeat our foes.
I stake my pride on it!

Show them what our pride is made of,
BanchoStingmon!
That’s the spirit, Ryo!
Let’s do this, Ryo!
Yeah, I’m counting on you, BanchoStingmon!
I’m happy we joined forces, Ryo!

Me too, BanchoStingmon! You’re the best
partner a guy could ask for!
Personal chatter is strictly prohibited...

Leave me alone!
I just want to be by myself.
Let’s face them with all our might!
I need to be the strong one...

We can win against any foe!
We have to believe as much.

Yeah, you’re right.
There’s gotta be a way through!

There’s no need for you to take this all on
by yourself, Takuma.

Thanks a lot.
I feel better now.
I’m counting on you, Takuma!

Got it!
I’ll try to do something!
I’m right behind you, so stay calm.
Thanks, I was getting a bit worked up...
Can I leave this place to you?
Yes, of course!

Minoru, I...I’m right behind you.
So buck up, will you?!

Sorry to make you worry.
I’ll do my best!
Can you help me out, Minoru?
Yeah! The hero’s gotta save the day!
Eyes ahead, Ryo, if you want to survive!

Nnnngh, dammit!
I just gotta do it, right?!
Ryo! Can I leave this area to you?
Yeah, you got it!

When things get tough, just say something.
I’ll help you anytime.
Thanks, but I can still fight!
Can I leave this to you, Saki?

If you think I’m up for the challenge,
then for sure!
Could you help me out, Saki?
Sure! I’ll give you all the help I can!

Let’s work together, Kaito.
Let’s get through this battle.

Hmph, thought I couldn’t cut it, huh?
Guess I gave you the wrong impression.
Sorry, Kaito, but I could use your help.
Sure, Shuuji! Let’s take them on!
Don’t worry, Miu... I’ll give you a hand.
Thanks, Shuuji...
Let’s work together, Miu!
Okay! I’ll do my best!
This is no time to get timid, Professor!

Ahh, sorry, Shuuji...
Yes...courage is a necessity.

Could you help me with this strategy,
Professor?
Of course, Shuuji, let’s fight together!
I’m with you, Miyuki. Have courage.

Shuuji...
Sorry to make you worry.

Alright, then, Miyuki.
I’ll leave this place to you!
Okay, Shuuji.

Without knowing their true colors, how could
I possibly trust and work with them?!
Jeez, this guy is tough...

Hey, Shuuji, should we run for it?
At this rate both of us are gonna die...
Lend me your strength, Lopmon!
Yeah! Leave it to me!
Please lend me your power, and stand with me!

My chest feels warm... Power’s flowing
through me!
Do your best, Shuuji!
Yeah, you got it!
Shuuji! Give me strength!
I believe you can win this, Lopmon!
I’ll protect Shuuji... I will!
Thanks, Lopmon, but I’ll face the enemy, too!
Can you keep going, Turuiemon?
Yeah, not a problem!
Do your best, Turuiemon!
Okay, Shuuji!
You’re the key to this fight, Turuiemon!
Understood, Shuuji!
Wendimon, I...I can trust you, can’t I?
Grrrwwwlll...
Here we go, Wendimon!

Grrr....
Grrrwwwlll...

Okay, Wendimon!
Let’s go, just like we planned!
Grrr, grrrwwwll...
Do your best out there, Andiramon!
Yes... I understand, Shuuji.

Time to execute our plan!
Okay, Andiramon?!
Okay, Shuuji! Awaiting orders!

Andiramon! Don’t give the enemy any more
ground!
You’re right, Shuuji! I’ll stop them here!

The power of the ultimate angel...
I’m counting on you, Cherubimon!
Yes, Shuuji... See for yourself...

We’ll halt this world’s destruction,
Cherubimon!
Yes... Come, let’s go, Shuuji!
At last, we’ve made it this far, Shuuji...

Yes, it’s taken us a long time to get here,
Cherubimon... You have my thanks!
Shuuji! Show me your soul!

You got it, Cherubimon!
How about this?! UWOOOOOO!!!

For now, I’d better focus on the enemy in
front of me!
Yeah, just like that!
Let’s do this!

Don’t tell me you plan on giving up here?
That’s not the Takuma I know!

Yeah... I’ll stand back up as many times as
I need to!

You’re not really into this, are you? Stand
up straight, and get your head in the game!

Yeah, you’re right. If I’m not feeling this
we’ve already lost.
I trust you, Takuma!
Thanks, Saki! I’ll have to live up to that!
We’ll win! There’s no other option!

Yeah, Saki...
I feel better just hearing you say that!
You can do it, Aoi!
Thanks, Saki!

It’s about time you showed me your 
cool side. Yeah?

Uh yeah, sure!
Just watch, I’ll show you how it’s done!

C’mon, Minoru!
Time for the hero to spring into action!

Yeah, leave it to me!
I’ll make it work!
Don’t get scared by the small fry!
Yeah, yeah, I got it already...!
You okay, Ryo? Can you keep it up?

Of course! I ain’t gonna look like a chump
in front of you!

Hey, Ryo! There’re some things only you can
do, right?
Of course! I’ll give ya a taste right now!
Believe in yourself! I’m relying on you!
Sorry to make you anxious. I’m all right now.
Time to demonstrate some leadership, Shuuji!
Okay, leave it to me!
We finally made it this far, Shuuji!
Yes, all because you’re here with me, Saki!

It’s rare to see you having a hard time,
Kaito. Need some backup?
Heh, as if. I’m good on my own!

You can definitely do it, Kaito!
You have my guarantee!

Who needs it?!
Ah, well, ’preciate it anyway.
Keep it up, Miu! I’m cheering you on!
Great, thanks, Saki!
Miu! Let’s tear on through them!
Yeah! Like a knife through butter!

Go for it, Professor!
No place for hesitation!

Ah, yeah... Hesitation...
You’re right, this is no place for timidity.

Say, Professor, don’t these enemies seem
kinda weak to you?
Yes, I felt the same. This is our chance!

Miyuki! I know battles are scary, but let’s
get through it together!
Yes, you’re right!

Miyuki... Sorry to cause you so much
trouble... It must have been painful, yes?

No, it’s not your fault, Saki...
It’s all their fault!
Tell me if it gets tough!

Thanks for worrying!
I’ll do my best!
Do your best, Floramon!
Of course! Leave it to me, okay?
I’m so happy we met, Floramon!
I feel the same, Saki!
I’ll work super hard, so don’t worry!

Thanks...
You’re the best, Floramon!
Pull yourself together, Saki!
Thanks, I’m okay, I swear!
Will you cheer me on, Saki?

Yeah! Two, four, six, eight, who do we
appreciate? Floramon! Floramon!
Can you keep it up a bit longer?
Of course! Just leave it all to me!

You might not look it, Vegimon, but...you
know, you’re actually pretty chill!

Hee hee, looks like you’ve figured out my
appeal! Happy to hear it!
Let’s take ’em all down at once, Vegimon!

Way to delegate!
All right, time to tear ’em a new one!
Hey, Blossomon! It’s almost your turn!
My time to shine!
You’re the best partner ever, Blossomon!
I love you too, Saki!

Do your best, Blossomon! I know you won’t
lose!
Of course! Not when you and I are a team!
Let’s change things up, Ceresmon Medium!
Yes, Saki, leave it to me.
Ceresmon Medium, you’re...you’re so pretty...
Ho ho... Thank you, Saki...
Let’s do our best, Saki!
Yeah! That’s right!

You and I, let’s end this nightmare together,
Saki...
Okay! We’ll blow this nightmare away!

Ceresmon... We’ve finally gotten this much
power...

This is the fruit of our bond...the results
of how far we’ve walked together!
Ceresmon! Wipe those punks out!
Sure, just leave it to me!

Saki... You have my thanks...
Your devotion allowed me to evolve this far.

I feel the same... My heart’s grown this
strong thanks to you...

The battle is almost over, Saki...
Still, it’s no time to let our guard down.

Jeez, you’re such a worrywart, Ceresmon!
There’s no way I’d let that happen!
If you have time to chat, swing those fists!

I’ll smash whatever comes at me...
That’s all there is to it!
Hmph, let’s do this!

If you really are that tough, wipe the floor
with these guys!

Hey, you’re looking a bit shy there, Takuma.
You ain’t gonna turn tail here, are ya?

Yeah, that’s not in the cards, is it?
Thanks, Kaito.

If you don’t fight, you can’t protect
anything! You know that much, don’t ya?!
...Yeah, you’re right. My mind is clear now.

Takuma! Now’s the time to show what you’re
made of!
Okay, Kaito! I’ll give it a shot!

Let’s tear them to pieces, Takuma!
No holding back!
Yeah...yeah you’re right, Kaito...

Don’t look like you’re about to blubber, man.
We haven’t lost yet.
Yeah... The battle starts here!
Let’s smack ’em all down here, Aoi!
Got it, Kaito!
And when did you plan on getting serious?

Unngh, just watch!
I’ll bring it when the chips are down!
We need your strength, Minoru!
Glad to hear it! All right, here I go!
There’s no time to waste standing around.

It’s no use...
That guy’s just not thinking straight.

Anyone dragging me down will get left behind!
Ya don’t like it? Get fighting!

Uh, y-yeah, I will!
So don’t say things like that!
Don’t freak out, Ryo!
Say what?! Who’s freaking out?!

We’re at the brink of life or death!
Ain’t no choice but to win here!
You’re not wrong, Kaito. Let’s win this.
Finish things like a high schooler should!
All right, Kaito! I’ll finish things here!

You’re awfully quiet.
That’s not like you at all.

Is that encouragement? That’s not like you,
either. Still, thanks for the pep talk!
Show me something good, Saki!

It’s rare to hear you say something like
that... All right, if you insist!

Your big brother’s with you, Miu!
Don’t worry!
Yeah, yeah, I got it already.
I’ll do anything for you, Miu!

Jeez, stop talking like that!
Look at what I can do on my own!
We’ll pull through this together, Miu!

Okay, bro! Let’s show them what us siblings
are made of!
Professor! You gettin’ scared or something?

Ah, yes... This is no good.
I’m an adult, after all!
Can I leave it to you, Professor?
Of course, you can depend on me!
Show those punks who’s boss!
Yes, I will!
Good luck! You can do it!
Thanks, I will!
Not bad, Dracumon!
Of course! I’ll take down any enemy!
I leave it to you, Dracumon!
Yeah, you got it!

With our power, we’ll wipe them out in one
go, Dracumon!

Heh heh, I like the sound of that, Kaito!
Time we get serious!

Hey, what’s up, Kaito?
Let’s go even harder!
Hmph, I was planning that from the start!
I’m counting on ya, Kaito!
You got it, Dracumon!
Say, Kaito, how should I take down the enemy?
Ain’t it obvious? Plow right into ’em!
We make the best pair, Kaito!
Of course, Dracumon! You and me are the best!

Playtime’s over. It’s about time to finish
this.
Yeah! The next blow’s the last!

Sangloupmon!
Can you keep going?

Who do you think you’re talking to?
Of course I can, easily!

Listen up, Sangloupmon!
Give those guys a nasty blow!
You got it, Kaito! Here I go!
Teach them the meaning of fear, Vamdemon!
Heh heh, very well...

Whaddaya think, Vamdemon?
Can you handle this fight?

I’ll show you the true meaning of strength,
Kaito...
Annihilate the enemy, Vamdemon!

Yes, Kaito... Without mercy...
I’ll make them regret defying me...
Can I leave this to you, Beelzebumon?!
Hmph... Took you long enough to ask, Kaito.
Show them the ultimate power, Beelzebumon!
Okay! Understood, Kaito!
I need our power, Kaito!

Okay, Beelzebumon! I’ll give you some of my
spirit!

Time for the main event, Kaito!
Hold it together!
Yeah! You’d better not lag behind, either!
Can I trust you, Voltobautamon?

Of course, Kaito... This power...I wield it
for your sake!
Show them your brutal power, Voltobautamon!
Bwahahahaha! You got it!
Kaito! You’re the key to winning this battle!

All right, Voltobautamon!
I’ll put more guts into it!

Kaito... Come with me...to a hellish
battlefield.

Sure, Voltobautamon... We’ll weather the
underworld together!

I have to make sure I don’t drag anyone
down...
Careful! Watch the enemy’s attack closely!
Good luck! I’ll be here with you!

Hold yourself together, Takuma!
I’ll do the same!
Sure, Miu! Let’s take a stand together!

Takuma, let’s strengthen our defenses and
proceed with caution!
You’re right, Miu! Defense is key!

When I’m with you, Takuma...
I feel like I can’t lose!

Same here, Miu... With you here, it’s like
I can win any battle!
I’ll do my best, Aoi, so cheer up!

Miu... You’re right, this is no time to lose
my nerve!

I have divine protection, Aoi!
Here, I’ll give some of it to you!

Oh, Miu... Okay, I’ll take some of that for
myself!

I’m with you, Minoru, so do your best!
I’ve got your back!
What’re you saying, Miu?! That’s my line!

Hey Minoru, I placed a curse on the enemy.
You can fight without fear now!

Uh, I don’t know if I’d trust that...
Aw what the heck, let’s do it!

You scared, Ryo? Here I’ll cheer you up!
“You can do iiit!”

Uh, hey! Who’s getting scared over wimps like
these?! I’ll take them out, no problem!

Ryo, my spirit power will lead us to victory,
so let’s do our best!

The heck is “spirit power”...
Heh heh, this’ll be a piece of cake anyway!

Ah, Shuuji... Are you frightened?
I’m helping too, okay?

Even you could tell, huh...
Okay, I’m counting on you, Miu!

Here’s my trump card, Shuuji:
a good luck charm!
Um, I don’t really get it, but thank you!

I’m scared of fighting, too, but let’s do
what we can together, Saki!

You’re right, Miu!
We’ll definitely get through this!

The great will of this world is my ally.
We’ll definitely be okay!

Okay, that’s a weird statement, Miu.
Ah well, guess I’ll believe it!

Don’t tell me you’re scared, Kaito?
Do you wanna hold my hand?

You think I’m scared? I’m always ready to
turn things around!
Don’t get too heated, Kaito! Stay cool.

I got it already, Miu! Twerps like this won’t
make me lose my cool!
Do your best, brother! I’m rooting for you!

Miu... YEAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!!
HERE I GOOOOOOOOO!!!

It looks like you’re getting cold feet,
Professor. Is there anything I can do?

Ah, no... Sorry, Miu.
This won’t do for an adult like me!

Keh keh keh... I sent the enemy a horrific
vision. They’ll be running soon, Professor...

Umm... I honestly don’t see that happening...
Best to steel our defenses...

Miyuki! Are you new to the battlefield?
Here, let me help!

Ah, no, Miu, it’s just been a while, so I’m
a bit confused. My instincts will return!

The enemy’s gathering their strength, Miyuki!
Let’s focus on defense!
Yes, Miu, my sentiments exactly!
I’m here with you, Shakomon, so do your best!
Okay! I’ll do everything I can!
I’m counting on you, Shakomon!
Just wait and see what I can do, Miu!

Shakomon...
My feelings are reaching you, aren’t they?

Of course! Your intense feelings are flowing
right into me!
My queen...no, Miu. Don’t lose focus now!
Yeah, Shakomon... We can’t get hurt here!

Let’s be careful, Miu. We don’t wanna make
Kaito worry!

You’re right, Shakomon!
I’ll show him what I can do!
Miu... When I’m with you, nothing scares me!
Yeah... I feel the same, Shakomon!
Show them how you’ve powered up, Shellmon!
You got it! I’ll send them all packing!
Take down the enemy, Shellmon!
Okay, Miu! I’ll plow right through them!

Wow...! I can feel your determination,
Shellmon!

That’s the power of our bond!
Proof that we’re in sync!

Now that you’re out of your shell, you’re
invincible! Right, Mermaimon?

Yes, you’re right! I’ll show you just how
right you are!
The early bird gets the worm, Mermaimon!

You’re right, Miu! I’ll get the jump on the
enemy!
Do your best, Mermaimon! I’m here with you!

Thank you, Miu!
I can really feel your energy!
You have to help everyone, MarinAngemon!
Peep, peep!
Show me the ultimate power, MarinAngemon!
Pyupyu!
Peepyu!

“Do your best, Miu”?
Okay, I will!
Peep, peepyu!

“Let’s fight together, Miu”?
Of course, MarinAngemon!

This is no time to talk.
Our lives are on the line!

How will I ever be forgiven... Or perhaps
it’s too late me for to want that?
Good... Yes, just like that!

The enemy is powerful, Takuma, but we can
pull through this together.
Yes, Professor! I’ll do what I can!

With our combined strength, we can overcome
any obstacle.

You’re right, Professor! As long as we work
together, we can do this!

Don’t lose your nerve, Aoi.
The enemy is coming.
Yes, I’ll face this danger without fear!
You hold the key to this battle, Aoi.
Professor... Okay, I understand!

There’s no room for the fainthearted here,
Minoru... Let’s face this together!

Yeah, you’re right... Thanks, man.
I’ll do everything I can!

I see, so the enemy had such numbers...
Are you ready, Minoru?

Yeah, Professor... I’ll win this fight and
become the hero I wanna be!

What’s wrong, Ryo? Your breathing has become
quite ragged. Are you all right?

Yeah, Professor... I think I’m fine...
Yeah, I mean I totally fine!

Okay, Ryo, let’s trounce them here.
Are you prepared?
Of course! I’m always ready to go!

I’m sure you’re worried, Shuuji, but don’t
let it swallow you up.

I understand, Professor...
I’ll muster as much courage as I can!

It looks like the tide of battle’s in our
favor, Shuuji. I leave it to your leadership.

Okay, Professor! I’ll overcome this situation
with my strength!

I’m sure that battle scares you, Saki, but
you have the courage to stand and fight!

Yeah, thanks, Professor.
I won’t run away... That’s a promise!
With our strength, we can win this battle!

Yeah... You’re right, Professor.
We’ve always fought together like this!

What’s wrong, Kaito? I sense an
uncharacteristic fear from you.

Nngh... Ya saw through me, Prof... But I’m
fine! I’ll just give that fear to the enemy!

I sense a disturbance in the enemy movements.
Think we should break through?

Yeah, I was thinking the same thing,
Professor. We can crush them with our power!

I’m sure it’s scary, Miu, but this is the
turning point. Let’s work together!

Yeah, I’m scared, but...I won’t back down!
I’ll fight through this!

There seems to be movement on the
battlefield... Brace yourself, Miu!

Yeah, something seems wrong here...
Time to get pumped!

Are you all right, sis? You seem a bit
frightened...

Yes, but I’m fine...
You’re with me, after all!

Fighting with you again like we did in the
past is like a dream, Miyuki!
Yes, Haru... Just like old times!
Are you okay, Gabumon? Can you fight?

Hmph, I don’t need any concern! Especially
not from you!
Do your best, Gabumon! I’m with you!

Yeah, I know! I can do even better when I’m
with you, Haru!

It’s been a while since you’ve fought, Haru.
You okay? You’re not scared?

Of course I’m fine! Since you’re here,
there’s nothing to fear!

Are you nervous, Garurumon?
Have you gotten scared?

Shut up! This is nothing for me, and I don’t
need nothing from you!!!

Garurumon! Show off as much power as
you like!

Yeah, I got it! Just make sure to watch over
me, okay?!

You can do it, Garurumon!
I believe in you!

Thanks, Haru! I’ll live up to your faith,
I swear it!
WereGarurumon... Would you fight for us?

No, not for you. I fight for myself...
Nothing more!

Break on through, WereGarurumon!
Nothing to do here but attack!
You said it! Take a good look at my power!
Proceed with caution! Okay, WereGarurumon?!
Yeah, you got it, Haru! I’ll be careful!

MetalGarurumon! These enemies should be
a mere trifle for you!

Leave it to me, Haru! I’ll send these guys
packing in an instant!

Okay, MetalGarurumon!
Show me your ultimate power!

Okay, Haru! I’ll put the strength I got from
you on full display!

The battle’s about to reach a fever pitch...
Are you okay with that?

What’re you saying, MetalGarurumon? I have no
fears as long as you’re around!

I’m feeling amazing, Haru... I finally get to
be with you like this again!

MetalGarurumon... I feel the same...
I’m positively brimming with courage!

Omegamon! It’s time to put an end to this
battle!

You’re right, Haru! I’ll finish things with
this power!

Omegamon... Simply incredible! To think that
two powers would join as one...!!!

No, not two, Haru. With you and Takuma, that
makes four powers dwelling in this body.
Leave this to me, Haru!
Okay, Omegamon! I’m counting on that power!

Don’t worry, Haru... As long as I have this
power, I won’t lose to anyone!

I know, Omegamon... I have high hopes for
that amalgam of ultimate power!
I’ll give my all in this battle!

We can all win together.
I know that much...!
Let’s survive together, Takuma!

Yeah, of course! We’ll definitely get through
this!

Let’s do our best, Takuma! I’ll do
everything I can, I promise!
Sure, Miyuki! Let’s do this together!

The enemy is strong, Aoi, but there’s no one
we can’t beat.

Yes... Yes, you’re right, Miyuki.
Okay... I’ll do my best!

We’ll get through this battle with our
strength, Aoi!

Yes, you’re right, Miyuki. As long as I’m
with you...I feel like it’ll be all right!

Keep focused, Minoru.
This isn’t the place to lose heart.

Heh, man, talk about pathetic...getting
cheered up by a kid. Fine, here I go!

I know you can make it through this, Minoru.
Take it from me!

Heh heh, thanks for the peace of mind!
I actually feel pretty awesome now!
Stop shaking, Ryo. The enemy’s watching.

Oh, shaddup! I ain’t shaking!
I’m the strongest, you hear?!

With you here, Ryo, I feel like we can’t lose
this fight!

Well hey, looks like you get it!
That’s Miyuki for you!
I know it’s scary, Shuuji, but right now...

Yeah, I’ll keep it in check. I’m sure I’m
capable of that now!

Focus on the fight, Shuuji. We need to make
sure everyone survives!

Yeah, everyone’s depending on me.
That’s why I can’t lose my cool!
Are you okay, Saki? You look a bit nervous.
I’m...I’m fine. Totally fine, I swear!

From the looks of the enemy, there’s no way
you can lose, Saki!

Uh, yeah, I guess you’re right!
Besides, losing’s not in our vocabulary!

Don’t tell me you’re scared, Kaito? If so,
then pull yourself together!

Damn, you saw right through me... Fine, I’ll
put more guts into it!

Let’s do our best together, Kaito.
We can win with your strength!

Yeah, you’re right. Together we’ll finish
this fight!

Is it scary, Miu? Don’t worry, we’re all here
with you!

Yeah... This is no time to get scared.
I’ll work hard with everyone!

I won’t let the enemy do as they please
anymore. So fight without fear, Miu!

Okay! I believe in you, Miyuki! You’re our
friend, after all!

Are you scared, Haru?
It’s okay, I’m here with you.

You always used to say that to me...
Those words always gave me courage!

You’re much stronger than you used to be,
Haru... So don’t worry!

Yes, I’m different from before... This time,
it’s my turn to save you!

In order to save Miyuki...
I’ll do whatever it takes!

Renamon! Don’t let the enemy get the jump on
you!
Of course! Speed is my specialty, after all!

Miyuki! I know you haven’t fought for
a while, but don’t worry, I’m here with you!

I know, Renamon! I’m not scared of anything
when you’re around!
Miyuki... I’ll be the one to protect you...!

Do your best, Kyubimon! I believe in your
strength!

I’ll live up to your faith!
Just watch, Miyuki!
Pull yourself together, Kyubimon!

Yes, sorry to make you worry, Miyuki... I’m
okay now!

There’s no way I can lose this battle...
For Miyuki’s sake!
Plunge through the enemy, Taomon!

Understood!
I’ll slaughter them at full power!

Taomon... Are you okay?
Can you still fight?

Ah, yes... I’m fine.
It’s time to turn things around!

A future with Miyuki...
This is all I desire!

Are you tired, Sakuyamon?
Do you want a rest?

No, I’m fine, Miyuki... I won’t let a foe
such as this get the better of me!
Let’s do our best, Sakuyamon!

Yes, Miyuki! With you here, I won’t lose to
any foe!

Are you frightened, Miyuki? This battle is
sure to get harder...

No, I’m not scared at all.
You’re with me, after all!

Miyuki! I’m so happy the two of us can fight
together again like this!
I feel the same, Sakuyamon!

Miyuki’s happiness is my happiness.
Yes...that’s all I need!
Do your best out there, Sakuyamon!
As you wish, Miyuki!

Let’s get through this battle together,
Sakuyamon!

Of course, Miyuki!
Let’s move forward together!

Believe in me, Miyuki!
I promise I’ll protect you!
Yes, Sakuyamon, I will!
I’ll crush the enemy with my power, Miyuki!

The power of a maid... Yes, you can do it...
I know you can!
You can do it, Huanglongmon!
I will never be defeated!
Let’s go, Huanglongmon!
As you say, Takuma!

As long as you do not give in, I will fight
with all I have.

Huanglongmon! You got more in you, right?
Okay, let’s do this for everyone!
All shall be as you wish, Takuma.
Huanglongmon... Thank you!
Believe in me, Baihumon!
Of course, Aoi... Your wish is my command.
Don’t take the enemy lightly, Baihumon!
I concur. They seem formidable, indeed.

This shall not end in tragedy, Aoi. In that
I believe.
You’re right, Baihumon! I feel the same!

I shall be the one to make your dream a
reality, Aoi. Here and now, witness my power!

You’re right, Baihumon! I just have to wish
with all my heart!
You good, Zhuqiaomon?!

Good? Is that what it means to be a hero? At
the very least, I’m in better shape than you.

That’s the spirit! Show ’em what we’re made
of, Zhuqiaomon!

But of course, Minoru. I hear you, loud and
clear!
Now, Minoru! Unleash that heroic spirit!

You got it, Zhuqiaomon! I’ll give it
everything I’ve got!
Say no more, Minoru. Our victory is at hand!
Dang, Zhuqiaomon...! You’re a true-blue hero!
Please, Xuanwumon! Let me fight with you!

Ah, Saki, what a beautiful smile. It fills me
to bursting with power!
Take them all out, Xuanwumon!
Hmph, very well.

Ah, the pleasures of a long life. It feels as
if you give me power, Saki.

Thank you, Xuanwumon! I’ll do all I can to
help!

Do not lose heart, Saki. Our bond is our
strength!

I’m fine, I tell you! Don’t worry about me,
just focus on the fight, Xuanwumon!

Qinglongmon’s the strongest there is! Isn’t
that right?!

Indeed, I shall not lose to anyone. We stand
as one!

Do it, Qinglongmon! Take them down, and take
them down hard!
As you wish, Miu! Witness my power!

Fret not, Miu. I, the guardian of this world,
am by your side.

Do it to it, Qinglongmon! I’m fighting right
here with you!

Indeed, Miu. Many others are wishing for our
triumph!

For our friends... No, for us! We’ve gotta
fight, Qinglongmon!
